sourcesContent:
import Layout from '../components/templates/layouts'
import { Hero } from '../components/organisms'
import {Container, Wrapper, View, Image, Text, Icon} from '../components/atoms'
import ImageHero from '../assets/illustrations/daily-resources.svg'
import Link from 'next/link'

const App = () => {
    
    return (
        <>
            <Layout title="Daily Resources">
                <Hero 
                title="Daily Resources" 
                subtitle="The more that you read the more things you will know." 
                img={ImageHero}/>
            
                <Container isEqualWidth="100%" boxSizing="border-box" padding="100px 100px 0px 100px">
                    <Wrapper>
                        <View className="large">
                            <View height="400px" className="semi-half">
                                <Image src="/static/unsplash/cover-1000-570f4642.jpeg" width="100%" height="100%" radius="20px"/>
                            </View>
                            <View className="semi-half" direction="column" justify="space-around">
                                <Text size="32" weight="bold" style={{letterSpacing:'0.1em'}}>Case studies in rearchitecting</Text>
                                <Text size="22">
                                 How Buffer, ThoughtWorks, N26, and Zapier have shifted their software to respond to new contexts and met new needs.
                                </Text>
                                <Icon name="arrowStraight" width="10em"/>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                        <View className="half" direction="column">
                            <View height="300px" width="100%">
                                <Image src="/static/unsplash/lucas-benjamin-wQLAGv4_OYs-unsplash.jpg" width="100%" height="100%" radius="20px"/>
                            </View>
                            <View direction="column" margin="30px 0 0 0">
                                <Text size="24" weight="bold" margin=" 0 0 10px 0">Architecture for generations</Text>
                                <Text size="20">On knowledge-sharing, mentorship, and the systems we make (and remake).</Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                        <View className="half" direction="column">
                            <View height="300px" width="100%">
                                <Image src="/static/unsplash/photo-boards-KZNTEn2r6tw-unsplash.jpg" width="100%" height="100%" radius="20px"/>
                            </View>
                            <View direction="column" margin="30px 0 0 0">
                                <Text size="24" weight="bold" margin=" 0 0 10px 0">Software architecture at scale</Text>
                                <Text size="20">Leaders at Foursquare, Hulu, and Twitter discuss early architecture decisions, downstream effects, and architectural philosophies.</Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                    </Wrapper>
                </Container>
                <Container isEqualWidth="100%" boxSizing="border-box" padding="100px 100px 0px 100px">
                    <Wrapper>
                        <View className="large" direction="row-reverse">
                            <View height="400px" className="semi-half">
                                <Image src="/static/unsplash/cover-1000-dda8a7cd.jpeg" width="100%" height="100%" radius="20px"/>
                            </View>
                            <View className="semi-half" direction="column" justify="space-around">
                                <Text size="32" weight="bold" style={{letterSpacing:'0.1em'}}>
                                    Exit the haunted forest
                                </Text>
                                <Text size="22">
                                haunted forest Enough is enough with that thicket of code impeding nearby work, trapping the unwary, discouraging the inexperienced, and exhausting veteran developers!
                                </Text>
                                <Icon name="arrowStraight" width="10em"/>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                        <View className="half" direction="column">
                            <View height="300px" width="100%">
                                <Image src="/static/unsplash/lucas-benjamin-wQLAGv4_OYs-unsplash.jpg" width="100%" height="100%" radius="20px"/>
                            </View>
                            <View direction="column" margin="30px 0 0 0">
                                <Text size="24" weight="bold" margin=" 0 0 10px 0">The process: Rearchitecting after acquisition</Text>
                                <Text size="20">How Gemnasium balanced speed, efficacy, and the notion of perfection as they rebuilt their source code.</Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                        <View className="half" direction="column">
                            <View height="300px" width="100%">
                                <Image src="/static/unsplash/photo-boards-KZNTEn2r6tw-unsplash.jpg" width="100%" height="100%" radius="20px"/>
                            </View>
                            <View direction="column" margin="30px 0 0 0">
                                <Text size="24" weight="bold" margin=" 0 0 10px 0">Systems analysis through postmortems</Text>
                                <Text size="20">Postmortems can help measure the unknown in working software systems. They can also inform changes that make those systems more resilientâ€”and better understood.</Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                    </Wrapper>
                </Container>
                <Container isEqualWidth="100%" boxSizing="border-box" padding="100px 100px 0px 100px">
                    <Wrapper>
                        <View className="large">
                            <View height="400px" className="semi-half">
                                <Image src="/static/unsplash/cover-1000-570f4642.jpeg" width="100%" height="100%" radius="20px"/>
                            </View>
                            <View className="semi-half" direction="column" justify="space-around">
                                <Text size="32" weight="bold" style={{letterSpacing:'0.1em'}}>Case studies in rearchitecting</Text>
                                <Text size="22">
                                 How Buffer, ThoughtWorks, N26, and Zapier have shifted their software to respond to new contexts and met new needs.
                                </Text>
                                <Icon name="arrowStraight" width="10em"/>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                        <View className="half" direction="column">
                            <View height="300px" width="100%">
                                <Image src="/static/unsplash/lucas-benjamin-wQLAGv4_OYs-unsplash.jpg" width="100%" height="100%" radius="20px"/>
                            </View>
                            <View direction="column" margin="30px 0 0 0">
                                <Text size="24" weight="bold" margin=" 0 0 10px 0">Architecture for generations</Text>
                                <Text size="20">On knowledge-sharing, mentorship, and the systems we make (and remake).</Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                        <View className="half" direction="column">
                            <View height="300px" width="100%">
                                <Image src="/static/unsplash/photo-boards-KZNTEn2r6tw-unsplash.jpg" width="100%" height="100%" radius="20px"/>
                            </View>
                            <View direction="column" margin="30px 0 0 0">
                                <Text size="24" weight="bold" margin=" 0 0 10px 0">Software architecture at scale</Text>
                                <Text size="20">Leaders at Foursquare, Hulu, and Twitter discuss early architecture decisions, downstream effects, and architectural philosophies.</Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                    </Wrapper>
                </Container>
            </Layout>
        </>
    )
}

export default App;
